Retrieve the details for a given {{report_id}} by making a GET request using basic authentication.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/message-reports.format

====Formats:====
xml, json

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Parameters:====
 * {{{report_id}}}: The message report id. You can find message reports for a given user here.
 
====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or <a href="http://sendible.com/api">api key</a> belonging to the Sendible user.
